body.name: GPS Navigation for Truck RV Car, (7 INCH),Latest 2023 Map (Free Lifetime Updates) Turn-by-Turn Voice and Lane Guidance, Speed and Red Light Warning
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs
features: ✅【Pre-installed 2023 North American map + Lifetime Map Updates】 The Latest Maps for North America, Canada and Mexico & comes with lifetime map updates for any future road changes and NEW roads .
✅【7 inch GPS Navigation】 7 inch GPS Navigation touch screen is clear and sensitive, HD display providing clearer viewing for poor eyesight, can be seen in bright sunlight.

✅【Professional GPS Navigation】7 inch Touch Screen GPS Navigation for Car and Truck Motorhome & RV.(1) You can Customize Route According to Your Vehicle’s Weight, Length, Height and Width, Avoid Roads with Width/Height/Weight Restrictions . (2) Fast & Accurate GPS Tracking.

✅【Car GPS Function】①Support Postcode, Address, Coordinates, Favorite and POI Search. ②4 Routes Options: Fast/Green/Short/Easy. ③Support GPS time or Map time setting. ④Support FM broadcast, but FM not mean FM radio, just for transferring the gps sound to your car.⑤Providing Intelligent Current Speed Camera Alerts, Sound Warning, Route Planning, Street Names Broadcast, Current Speed and Active Lane Assistant, Display Remaining Distance, telling Estimated Arrival Time ( real voice announcement).
✅【what you get】 GPS Navigation for Car, Vehicle Charger, USB Cable, Holder, User Guide and Video Tutorials.
body.description: Reliable, Accurate and Precise GPS Navigation for Car, Truck or RV If you are after a GPS navigation system that will get you to your destination in the shortest possible time with the least amount of fuss then HUTNVEA could be for you. Functions: ✔ Pre-installed with the latest maps of North America, including maps of the United States, Canada, and Mexico ✔ Lifetime map update ✔ Maps for Europe, South America, Africa, the Middle East, Australia and Asia are availables ✔ Support cars, trucks, ambulances, motorhome, buses, taxis, etc of 12V to 24V ✔ Speed monitoring and reminder of overspeed ✔ The voice of navigation can be synchronized with the car player via FM ✔ Multilingual: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Finnish, Polish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Romanian, etc

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HUTNVEA 7 Inch GPS Navigation GPS Navigation x 1 Suction Cup Mount x 1 Back Bracket x 1 User Manual x 1 USB Data Cable x 1 Car Charger x 1 Specifications: Memory: 8 GB ROM & 256 MB RAM Supports SD cards up to 32 GB Video format: MP4 / ASF / WMV / AVI / DIVX / XVID E-book format: TXT, TTS FM Transmitter (76.0MHz -108MHz) Transfer the GPS sound into the car Screen resolution: 800 × 480 Operating system: Windows CE 6.0 USB interface: USB 2.0 Reliable, Accurate and Precise GPS Navigation for Car, Truck or RV If you are after a GPS navigation system that will get you to your destination in the shortest possible time with the least amount of fuss then HUTNVEA could be for you. Functions: ✔ Pre-installed with the latest maps of North America, including maps of the United States, Canada, and Mexico ✔ Lifetime map update ✔ Maps for Europe, South America, Africa, the Middle East, Australia and Asia are availables ✔ Support cars, trucks, ambulances, motorhome, buses, taxis, etc of 12V to 24V ✔ Speed monitoring and reminder of overspeed ✔ The voice of navigation can be synchronized with the car player via FM ✔ Multilingual: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Finnish, Polish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Romanian, etc
Reliable, Accurate and Precise GPS Navigation for Car, Truck or RV
Support 7 Vehicle Modes The default vehicle mode is truck mode. Change as follows: Navigation > Settings Icon:> Route Settings > Vehicle: Car, Pedestrian, Bicycle, Emergency, Bus, Taxi, Truck(Lorry).
2D&3D Maps Our map has built-in 2D and 3D visual modes. The 2D flat map has the characteristics of simplicity and clarity, and the 3D stereo map gives you a stronger sense of space.

Driver Warnings & Alerts Alerts you of dangerous or restricted roads, traffic camera’s, height and weight restrictions for large vehicle Speed Alerting - Alerts you of any speed limits, your current speed and if you are over the limit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: Pros:1. The screen size is perfect for me.2. It gives very detailed street names as you drive.3. There are a large number of option for turning off un-wanted functions.4. I know if I am speeding. A big help:-)Cons:1. The sun shade is flimsy, but does the job. You have to place it on very carefully and position it just right.2. The instructions are printed way too small. I scanned them and enlarged them and then saved them to my laptop computer, so that I could read them, without a lot of eye strain.3. The routes it gives you are not the shortest. But. If you zoom out you can see where you really should go.I do recommend this product highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money....and it was USED!
reviews.reviewText: GPS was obviously used, but I've already returned it, and wish I had taken pictures. Despite that, I plugged it in and attempted to use it. I know why it was returned....IT DOESNT WORK. It continued to say "GPS searching" for over an hour and never gave me directions. I even drove around to see if it would pick up the satellites, but no. Good thing I wasn't actually trying to get somewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hard to operate, especially with the cords given you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Different to set up
reviews.reviewText: Going to have to learn how it works for sure. If one stops it will not continue your trip from where to stopped if it has shut down. Different to set up and get address in properly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product value for money
reviews.reviewText: I am using this product from last 2 days, this is really a great product. Screen and Touch is very good, it is showing accurate destination as well. It is very easy to install, also can set multiple style of voice as well which will give extra awareness on any steps like turns etc. In a single word it is really nice product and worth money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Less than quality product
reviews.reviewText: Initially, I thought it was a less expensive version of a Garmin product. Boy, was I wrong. This device could not hold a candle to a Garmin. Screen size was good but that is about it. Would have returned but threw out packaging assuming it would work well. Boy, that mistake is on me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall a good GPS navigation
reviews.reviewText: Using this product from 3 weeks looks good so far. The maps are updated with latest location data. I am avid traveler who goes to national parks every month where Google maps not available. This comes in handy many times the recent one was in arches national park where we had zero signal and this saved us the effort of looking into paper maps. Overall satisfied with product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars GPS has no audio
reviews.reviewText: Cannot get this to work. No audio. Bought extended warranty and never received the paperwork. No idea who to call for help. The company who made the GPS does not respond.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gracias por mandarme un aparato magnífico

reviews.reviewText: si me gusto, es para reparto
